articles.description: ESPN's new 10-year deal with the SEC will change college football Saturdays and possibly the way fans consume the sport on their screens.
articles.content: Burke Magnus has coveted this particular piece of Saturday afternoon real estate for so long that the ESPN executive had plenty of time to find exactly the perfect phrase to describe it. Magnus, the … [+727 chars]
